body:
Hello, welcome to another Topic!
Today, we will discuss about something unbelievable:
The kill number one million.
As well everyone know, recently we have got the kill number 100,000 by an unique and single member: Sunrise. But;
Now, let's think,  there can be a 1,000,000th, right? If we has hit 100,000 why not 1,000,000?
Okay; Now let's start.
In your opinion, on Avicus, who will be the first person getting the kill number 1,000,000? 
In my opinion, it will be Sunrise, because he plays a lot, he is good at pvp, and he was the first getting the 100,000th.
body_tagged:

title: >>Who will get the 1,000,000th kill?<<
